items.badge_name: Dubbel, Tripel and Quad Oh My!
items.badge_description: Dubbel, Tripel, or Quad, you can’t go wrong with these amazing feats of Belgian style brewing. Whether you’re looking for something light and golden or dark and boozy, one of these will do the trick! That's 5 different beers with the style of Dubbel, Tripel or Quad! Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers with the style of Belgian Dubbel, Tripel or Quad.

items.badge_name: Dubbel, Tripel and Quad Oh My!
items.badge_description: Dubbel, Tripel, or Quad, you can’t go wrong with these amazing feats of Belgian style brewing. Whether you’re looking for something light and golden or dark and boozy, one of these will do the trick! That's 5 different beers with the style of Dubbel, Tripel or Quad! Try 5 more for Level 2!

What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that been brewed as a collboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers that been brewed by 2 more more breweries (collaboration).

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that been brewed as a collboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Hazy and white like a winter storm, but best enjoyed on a warm sunny day. This specific style of wheat beer brings with it a subtle mix of spices and hops, giving it a distinct flavor with little bitterness. That's 5 different beers categorized as a Witbier. Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers that are categorized as a Witbier.

items.badge_description: Hazy and white like a winter storm, but best enjoyed on a warm sunny day. This specific style of wheat beer brings with it a subtle mix of spices and hops, giving it a distinct flavor with little bitterness. That's 5 different beers categorized as a Witbier. Try 5 more for Level 2!
It's time to celebrate water, barley, yeast, and hops. On this National Beer Day, let's raise a toast to our favorite beverage... beer, duh!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer on April 7th, 2015 in your Local Timezone.

items.badge_description: It’s April and that means one thing: NC Beer Month is back! An annual celebration of the unique flavors of North Carolina craft brews filled with events and beer-related travel deals throughout the month. Find out more at http://ncbeermonth.com. Cheers!
items.badge_hint: Check in to (1) one beer from a list of NC Breweries on our blog form 4/1/15 to 4/30/15. (This for the April list only!)

items.badge_name: Sierra Nevada: New Year, New Beers
items.badge_description: Solid beer choice. Watch for Sierra Nevada’s three brand new beers: Hop Hunter IPA, Nooner Pilsner, and Beer Camp Hoppy Lager. Check into one of them to start collecting Alpha Ascent badges, you beer adventurer!
items.badge_hint: Check­in to any Sierra Nevada beer between 3/5/15 - 4/5/15.

items.badge_description: Cheers to kick­starting your ascent! Find your stride and look for the second of three milestones on the journey: Hop Hunter IPA, Nooner Pilsner, and Beer Camp Hoppy Lager.
items.badge_hint: Check in to any one (1) of Sierra Nevada’s newest beers ­ Hop Hunter IPA, Nooner Pilsner, or Beer Camp Hoppy Lager ­ between 3/5/15 - 4/5/15.

items.badge_description: You’ve never had it, but you’ll take our word for it. Try 10 different recommended brews in the last 60 days.
items.badge_hint: Take your pick, select a recommended beer from our list!

items.badge_name: Magners Irish Cider St. Patrick’s Day (2015)
items.badge_description: Celebrate St. Patrick’s Day with Magners Irish Cider! Made from 17 varieties of apples and aged for up to two years in oak vats, both our Original and Pear ciders are best served over ice, with friends. Now is a good time.
items.badge_hint: Check­in 3 times to Magners Irish Ciders or Irish Pear Cider from 3/13/15 ­- 4/13/15.

items.badge_description: Cheers to the Luck of the Irish on this St. Patrick's Day! Whether you're enjoying a hefty Triple IPA or a green Pilsner, we hope you have a blast!
items.badge_hint: Check-in with ANY beer on 3/17/15 in your Local Timezone. Cheers!

items.badge_description: Time to count up those beads, did you get more than last year? Here is to celebrating the end of Mardi Gras! Happy Fat Tuesday!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer on Fat Tuesday (2/17/15).

items.badge_description: Congratulations! You have checked in two beers from Beer City USA, aka Grand Rapids, Michigan. Or, as USA Today prefers to call us, America’s Best Beer Town. This is where beer lovers come to enjoy more sensational suds per square mile, at 30+ close­by craft breweries.
items.badge_hint: Check­in to two (2) beers by different Brewery from a list provided on our Blog from 2/16/15 to 3/16/2015

items.badge_description: Beer doesn't have to be rare to be world-class. As long as you’re into bold, uncompromising, well-crafted beer, there’s something in Founders’ year-round arsenal for you.
items.badge_hint: Check-in to two different year-round beers (Dirty Bastard, Centennial IPA, All Day IPA, Pale Ale, Porter, Red’s Rye IPA) from 2/2/15 to 3/2/15.

items.badge_description:
You've discovered a pot of gold, or you've just had one too many. 

That's at least 5 Irish beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Try a couple beers (5 different) from the land that taught you that there is a pot of gold at the end of rainbow. This badge can be leveled to 10. (5 distinct beers per level).

items.badge_description:
You've discovered a pot of gold, or you've just had one too many. 

That's at least 5 Irish beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.
Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 15 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 4!
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher.

items.badge_description: Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 15 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Time to knock back your favorite brew while watching the grid iron battle between the East and the West!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer on Super Bowl Sunday, 2015.

items.badge_description: Strong, bold flavors really suit you. The barleywine brings with it a long history dating all the way back to ancient Greece. That's 5 different Barleywine Beers! Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers that are categorized as a Barleywines.

items.badge_description: Strong, bold flavors really suit you. The barleywine brings with it a long history dating all the way back to ancient Greece. That's 5 different Barleywine Beers! Try 5 more for Level 2!
Grab a pot and put it on your head because you're a modern day Johnny Appleseed. That's 5 different ciders. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Who doesn't like apples? Personally we like Cider. Try 5 different ones. This badge can be leveled to 10.

items.badge_description: Grab a pot and put it on your head because you're a modern day Johnny Appleseed. That's 5 different ciders. Try 5 more to unlock Level 2.
Normally DIY furniture and meatballs are all that come to mind, but now you can add Swedish beer to that list! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from Sweden. Try 5 more Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers from a brewery from Sweden.

items.badge_description: Normally DIY furniture and meatballs are all that come to mind, but now you can add Swedish beer to that list! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from Sweden. Try 5 more Level 2.
You have mastered the art of Japanese Beer. That's 5 different Beers from Japan. Try 5 more for Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Drink 5 different beers from Japan. This badge can be leveled to 10 (5 Distinct Beer per Level)

items.badge_description: You have mastered the art of Japanese Beer. That's 5 different Beers from Japan. Try 5 more for Level 2.
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 5 different beers Fruit Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer.

items.badge_description: It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 5 different beers Fruit Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.
Celebrate the start of a new year with your favorite beer. We wish you an amazing 2015 full of adventure and great brews. Cheers!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer on 12/31/14 to 1/4/15. Happy New Year!

items.badge_description: Beer is often better with friends. Besides, drinking socially is what we're all about! You've checked in with at least 10 other people within 5 hours.
items.badge_hint: Check-in to a location with at least 10 others within 5 hours.

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery. This badge can be leveled to 10.

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 2!
’Tis the season of joy, cheer and of course, great beer. Wishing you a wonderful holiday season! Merry Brew-mas to all and to all a good pint. From all of us at Untappd, Happy Holidays!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer from 12/25/14 to 12/28/14 in your local-time zone.

items.badge_description: Aw yeah! You have officially unlocked Shock Top bragging rights and this sweet winter seasonal badge. Best. Day. Ever. Don’t forget to mix and match to create your own epic combos.
items.badge_hint: Check in one beer from the 2014 Shock Top Winter sampler pack by 2/15.

items.badge_description: Watching your figure? You certainly like your light beer. That's at least 3 of the most popular American Light Beers.
items.badge_hint: Drink the top 3 American Light beers. Come on - you see them on the commercials all the time.

items.badge_description: America, f**k yeah! It feels good to be an American! Now what channel’s got NASCAR?
items.badge_hint: Tough one here - drink the popular American beers (Coors, Bud, Miller) - plus a special Platinum beer from Bud...

items.badge_description: Crack open your favorite brew and be thankful for all the craft beer community has given us while celebrating with friends and family! Cheers and happy Thanksgiving!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer between 11/27/14 - 11/30/14 in your local-timezone. Happy Thanksgiving!

items.badge_description: It's cold outside - warm up with Winter beers. That's at least 10 different Winter beers try 5 more for Level 3!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with a Winter theme (meaning that they have Winter in the title or style).

items.badge_description: It's cold outside - warm up with Winter beers. That's at least 10 different Winter beers try 5 more for Level 3!
It's cold outside - warm up with Winter beers. That's at least 5 different Winter beers try 5 more for Level 2!
Happy birthday to you! Drinks are on us! Hopefully you’ll remember this tomorrow.
items.badge_hint: Go out and celebrate your birthday with Untappd!

items.badge_description: Happy birthday to you! Drinks are on us! Hopefully you’ll remember this tomorrow.
Your beer tastes are legendary. That’s over 500 different brews!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 500 different beers. It's that simple.

items.badge_description: Fall is in the air and the holidays are just around the corner, but pies and jack-o-lanterns aren't the only things pumpkins are good for. Pumpkin beers have grown in popularity, bringing with them a delicate balance of malt and spices. That's 5 different pumpkin beers! Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check in to 5 different beers that have a style Pumpkin/Yam. This badge can be leveled to 10. It is not retroactive, your counter started on 10/11/13.

items.badge_description: Fall is in the air and the holidays are just around the corner, but pies and jack-o-lanterns aren't the only things pumpkins are good for. Pumpkin beers have grown in popularity, bringing with them a delicate balance of malt and spices. That's 5 different pumpkin beers! Try 5 more for Level 2!
Weddings are always so nice, especially with an open bar. Let everyone know you’re at a wedding in the comment!
items.badge_hint: Let your friends know that you're at a wedding with your check-in (add the word "Wedding" to your check-in comment)!

items.badge_description: What’s the Coast to Coast Toast? Learn more about the beers, nationwide Toast, events near you and more at http://www.coast-­2-­coast-­toast.com. By obtaining this badge, you’ll also be eligible to sign up and win a trip to Iceland for two, courtesy of Iceland Naturally, Total Beverage Solutions and Untappd! Winners will be chosen at random in a drawing on December 5th.
items.badge_hint: Check­in one (1) beer from a selected list of beer on the Untappd Blog between 11/1/14 ­- 12/1/14.

items.badge_description: Cheers to the thick, roasted goodness that is the stout! International Stout Day is a celebration of this iconic beer style, creating awareness of it's bold, malty and full bodied deliciousness. Enjoy a stout and show your love!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to any stout style beer on International Stout Day, November 6th!

items.badge_description: It’s in the fridge, so why not drink it. Hope you don’t get bored. Drink 6 of the same beer, in a row, in 1 week.
items.badge_hint: They say a title tells the story. This time - they are dead on.  Drink 6 of the same beer, in a row, in 1 week. Don't have another a beer in-between!

items.badge_description: Trick or treat? Halloween is here and the witch's brew is ready for partaking. Break out your most ghastly of beers and celebrate!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer from 10/31 to 11/2 (in your local timezone).

items.badge_description: When it comes to a delicious beer from the Netherlands, going Dutch doesn’t have to mean sharing it. That's 5 different beers from a brewery from the Netherlands. Try 5 more Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 different beers from the Netherlands.

items.badge_description: When it comes to a delicious beer from the Netherlands, going Dutch doesn’t have to mean sharing it. That's 5 different beers from a brewery from the Netherlands. Try 5 more Level 2.
Three cheers to four years! It's Untappd's fourth birthday and we couldn't be happier. Celebrate with your favorite brew - you deserve it. Thanks to you and the entire community for all the support!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to any beer and celebrate Untappd's 4th birthday between 10/22 - 10/31.

items.badge_description: The age old battle of who has more fun - blondes or brunettes? In this case, you obviously chose "brewnettes"!  That's 20 different Brown Ales. Try 5 more for Level 5.
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with the style American Brown Ale, English Brown Ale, Imperial / Double Brown Ale or Belgian Brown Ale.

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for it’s vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 2.

You have a keen taste for this Belgian master piece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgium Farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 20 different Saisons, try 5 more for Level 5.
items.badge_hint: Check in to 5 different Saison / Farmhouse Ales.

Sounds like you’re considering joining the Trappist Monks. I thought Monks couldn't drink beer? Oh well. That's 5 Trappist Beers!
items.badge_hint: Planning to be a monk? Try 5 different beers from Trappist Breweries! PS - Check Wikipedia.

items.badge_description: Interpretations of IPAs range far and wide — and Founders has interpreted the style in many ways. Founders IPAs vary in taste, strength and color, from the crimson of Red’s Rye IPA (draft only right now) to the golden straw of Double Trouble. Try a couple and see which interpretation suits you best. Hop 2 It!
items.badge_hint: Check­in to two (2) different IPAs from Founders Brewing Co listed on the Untappd Blog between August 1st ­- August 31st, 2014

items.badge_description: Today, we all raise a crisp, bitter toast to one of the most iconic beer styles, the India Pale Ale. It’s IPA Day, so join the world as we all celebrate this style’s hoppy goodness!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer the has the style listed an Black IPA, American IPA, English IPA, Double IPA, Triple IPA or White IPA on August 7th, 2014 in your local timezone.

items.badge_description: Happy 4th of July! Celebrate America's independence with good friends, good food and most importantly, good beers!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer during July 4th Weekend 2014 (July 4th - July 6th).

items.badge_description: Woah! You’ve had at least five beers that the Untappd founders have had. That’s tough since we like a wide variety of beers. Obviously you’re just trying to be cool like us!
items.badge_hint: Have 5 beers that the Co-Founders of Untappd have had in the last 90 days.

items.badge_description: Goooooaaaaalllll! Cheers to the diversity of the World Cup and may the best team win!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to a beer from two different countries participating in the 2014 World Cup, from 6-12 to 7-13.
